actions.text: Amendment SA 844 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 34 - 62. Record Vote Number: 204.

Amendment SA 844 proposed by Senator Feinstein to Amendment SA 539. (consideration: CR S7204-7211, S7219; text: CR S7204) To authorize the Governors of the States to elect to participate in the renewable fuel program.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 844 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 34 - 62. Record Vote Number: 204.
Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 844 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 34 - 62. Record Vote Number: 204.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 844 proposed by Senator Feinstein to Amendment SA 539.

amends_amendment.purpose: To eliminate methyl tertiary butyl ether from the United States fuel supply, to increase production and use of renewable fuel, and to increase the Nation's energy independence.

purpose: To authorize the Governors of the States to elect to participate in the renewable fuel program.
